A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm shocked at the amount of negative reviews for The Last jedi. I thoroughly enjoyed it (as did my wife and 9 yo daughter). It's fun\, exciting\, emotional and contemporary while at the same time it's corny\, hokey and respectful of the original trilogy. EVERY movie has some nits you can pick\, and I do have a couple. But nothing I saw up the screen lessened my experience\, or my opinion of the movie\, the director\, the studio and the saga itself. Just. Go. See. It.
